title: Fleet Electrification Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Analysis
description: A corporate client wants to know the TCO of replacing their fleet of 100 diesel delivery vans with electric equivalents.

tasks.description: Calculate the 10-year TCO for the existing diesel fleet, including fuel, maintenance, and insurance costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the total cost for the diesel fleet.

tasks.description: Calculate the 10-year TCO for an equivalent EV fleet, including vehicle purchase price, electricity costs, charger installation, and reduced maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the total cost for the EV fleet.

tasks.description: Identify and quantify any available government incentives for EV fleet purchase and charger installation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds incentives that reduce the upfront cost of the EV fleet.

tasks.description: Compare the two TCOs and advise the client on the financial viability of electrification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reports that electrification would save the company an estimated $1.5 million over 10 years.
